name: blitheness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being happy and without worry, especially when there is a reason to be worried: When his father abandons his mother after 30 years of marriage, he is moved by his mother's despair and shocked by his dad's blitheness. The blitheness with which the tech company publicised this information raises serious questions about internet privacy.
